member.name: T:Alchemy4Tridion.Plugins.AlchemyApiController
member.summary: The Alchemy WebAPI Controller. Alchemy controllers should inherit from this base class to automatically get picked up.

member.name: T:Alchemy4Tridion.Plugins.AlchemyPluginBase
member.summary: Abstract base class to inherit your Alchemy Plugins from.

member.name: T:Alchemy4Tridion.Plugins.IAlchemyPlugin
member.summary: Interface for an alchemy plugin that will automatically get exported.

member.summary: Maps a url relative to the editor url.
member.param: The url to map

member.name: P:Alchemy4Tridion.Plugins.IAlchemyPlugin.AppUrl
member.summary: Gets the Alchemy application url to the plugin. (ie '/Alchemy/Plugins/PluginName/').
member.remarks: The AppUrl is used when calling to alchemy services directly. For GUI related items the EditorUrl should be used.

member.summary: Gets the Tridion Editor url to the plugin. (ie '/WebUI/Editors/Alchemy/Plugins/PluginName/').

member.summary: Gets the GUI editor sections that are contained in this plugin. (Set by Core framework.)

member.summary: Gets the plugin information.

member.summary: Gets the unique name of the plugin.

member.name: P:Alchemy4Tridion.Plugins.IAlchemyPlugin.PluginPath

member.summary: Gets the summary of the plugin.

member.summary: Maps a url relative to the editor url.

member.name: P:Alchemy4Tridion.Plugins.AlchemyPluginBase.AppUrl
member.summary: Gets the Alchemy application url to the plugin. (ie '/Alchemy/Plugins/PluginName/').
member.remarks: The AppUrl is used when calling to alchemy services directly. For GUI related items the EditorUrl should be used.

members.member:
Gets the Tridion Editor url to the plugin. (ie '/WebUI/Editors/Alchemy/Plugins/PluginName/').
/// The EditorUrl is for using context under the Tridion editor. For accessing your webapi controllers, the AppUrl should be used.

member.name: P:Alchemy4Tridion.Plugins.AlchemyPluginBase.EditorSections
member.summary: Gets the GUI editor sections that are contained in this plugin. (Set by Core framework.)

member.name: P:Alchemy4Tridion.Plugins.AlchemyPluginBase.Id
member.summary: Gets the unique web store identifier of the plugin from plugin info.. Returns null if there is no id (plugin was never uploaded).

member.name: P:Alchemy4Tridion.Plugins.AlchemyPluginBase.Name
member.summary: Gets the unique name of the plugin from plugin info.

member.name: P:Alchemy4Tridion.Plugins.AlchemyPluginBase.PluginInfo
member.summary: Gets the plugin information (represented by the plugin's xml file).

member.name: P:Alchemy4Tridion.Plugins.AlchemyPluginBase.PluginPath
member.summary: Gets the absolute path to the plugin including the plugin folder. ie (C:\Tridion\Alchemy\Plugins\PluginName\)

member.name: P:Alchemy4Tridion.Plugins.AlchemyPluginBase.Summary
member.summary: Gets the summary of the plugin (from plugin info, uses summary if available, else the beginning of description).

member.returns: A collection of web api types.

member.name: T:Alchemy4Tridion.Plugins.Utilities.Impersonator
member.summary: Impersonation of a user. Allows to execute code under another user context. Please note that the account that instantiates the Impersonator class needs to have the 'Act as part of operating system' privilege set.
member.remarks:
This class is based on the information in the Microsoft knowledge base article http://support.microsoft.com/default.aspx?scid=kb;en-us;Q306158
Encapsulate an instance into a using-directive like e.g.:
... using ( new Impersonator( "myUsername", "myDomainname", "myPassword" ) ) { ... [code that executes under the new context] ... } ...
Please contact the author Uwe Keim (mailto:uwe.keim@zeta-software.de) for questions regarding this class.

member.name: M:Alchemy4Tridion.Plugins.Utilities.Impersonator.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Constructor. Starts the impersonation with the given credentials. Please note that the account that instantiates the Impersonator class needs to have the 'Act as part of operating system' privilege set.
member.param: The name of the user to act as.
The domain name of the user to act as.
The password of the user to act as.

member.name: F:Alchemy4Tridion.Plugins.Utilities.Impersonator._tridionWebInstallPath
member.summary: The physical location where the Tridion web site was installed.

member.name: F:Alchemy4Tridion.Plugins.Utilities.Impersonator._tridionBaseRegistryKey
member.summary: The base Tridion registry key.

member.summary: Does the actual impersonation.
member.param: The name of the user to act as.
The domain name of the user to act as.
The password of the user to act as.

member.summary: Reverts the impersonation.
